title: What exactly counts as immobilize?
body:
its so hard to find exact info on what the fuck counts as what in this game.... fuck

{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

replies.body: Suppression, root, stun and now sleep (and amumu ult, even though it technically doesn't say enemies are stunned/rooted), also all knockups/displacements too all count as immobilize, something like lulu polymorph does not count because even though you can't use abilities/summoners you can still move (slowly).

Basically I was curious if a slow counted.

I tested it.

Slows don't count.
I did google it, and found all sorts of random info... but ty.
Things that stop you from moving

Anything that prevents movement from one spot.

Roots, stuns, knockups, and entangle should be all of them.
Would be op on Gnar if slow counted as immobilize :D

immobilize [verb] prevent (something or someone) from moving or operating as normal.

Operating as normal would include slows. However, in league slows don't count as an immobilization
